nodes.documentation:
A poll is a contract that stores potential options to vote on, as well as which addresses have voted already.
Addresses can vote on the poll until the poll owner closes the contract.
Addresses can also put their votes for sale as long as they have not voted yet.
nodes.name: Poll

nodes.documentation: Event triggered every time a new vote is given in this poll
nodes.name: NewVote

nodes.documentation: Event triggered when a vote is put for sale
nodes.name: VoteForSale

nodes.documentation: Event triggered when a vote is sold
nodes.name: VoteOwnershipChanged

nodes.documentation: Event triggered when the poll is closed
nodes.name: PollClosed

nodes.documentation: A poll requires a name and a bytes32 for each option.

nodes.name: vote
buysVote

nodes.documentation:
Delegates a vote to someone else.
@param _owner address of the new owner of this vote
nodes.name: delegateVote

nodes.documentation: Closes the poll. This action is irreversible and can only be performed once.
nodes.name: closePoll

nodes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if the poll is still opened.
nodes.name: pollOpen

nodes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if the message sender has already voted in this poll
nodes.name: notVoted

nodes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if the address trying to vote owns that vote
nodes.name: ownsVote

nodes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if a vote is for sale
nodes.name: forSale

attributes.documentation:
A poll is a contract that stores potential options to vote on, as well as which addresses have voted already.
Addresses can vote on the poll until the poll owner closes the contract.
Addresses can also put their votes for sale as long as they have not voted yet.
attributes.name: Poll

attributes.documentation: Event triggered every time a new vote is given in this poll
attributes.name: NewVote

attributes.documentation: Event triggered when a vote is put for sale
attributes.name: VoteForSale

attributes.documentation: Event triggered when a vote is sold
attributes.name: VoteOwnershipChanged

attributes.documentation: Event triggered when the poll is closed
attributes.name: PollClosed

attributes.documentation: A poll requires a name and a bytes32 for each option.

attributes.name: vote
buysVote

attributes.documentation:
Delegates a vote to someone else.
@param _owner address of the new owner of this vote
attributes.name: delegateVote

attributes.documentation: Closes the poll. This action is irreversible and can only be performed once.
attributes.name: closePoll

attributes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if the poll is still opened.
attributes.name: pollOpen

attributes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if the message sender has already voted in this poll
attributes.name: notVoted

attributes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if the address trying to vote owns that vote
attributes.name: ownsVote

attributes.documentation: Function modifier that checks if a vote is for sale
attributes.name: forSale

params._claimer: address of the claimer to be added

buysVote(address).details: This method only works if the vote has not been used AND is for sale

params._voteAddr: the address of the seller whose vote is intended to buy

params._owner: address of the new owner of this vote

isClaimable().details: The contract is claimable when the 3 results are true.
isClaimable().return: bool: is a claimer, bool: is expired, bool: is not owner

isClaimer(address).return: true if the caller has been added as claimer, false, otherwise

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

read().return: (address: owner of this contract, uint: the expiration date, bool: is caller a claimers?)

params._claimer: address of the claimer to be removed

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._expirationTime: the new expiration time for this contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._option: a bytes32 representing the option to vote.
params._voter: address of the voter this vote refers to. Message sender must own that right

addClaimer(address).notice: Adds a new claimer to the contract

buysVote(address).notice: Buys a vote for sale. Enough funds must be transferred to this method.  More funds than necessary will be refunded.

claim().notice: Claim ownership of the contract, once the max inactive time is reached.  Only addresses in claimers can claim, unless the array is empty.

closePoll().notice: Closes the poll. This action is irreversible and can only be performed once.

methods.constructor: A poll requires a name and a bytes32 for each option.

delegateVote(address).notice: Delegates a vote to someone else.

getExpirationTime().notice: Gets the current expiration time set in this contract

isClaimable().notice: Checks if the expiration date is passed and contract can be claimed.

isClaimer(address).notice: returns true if the caller has been added as claimer on this contract

read().notice: returns the owner of this contract, the expiration date and if the caller is one of the claimers

removeClaimer(address).notice: Removes a claimer from the contract

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setExpirationTime(uint256).notice: allows the owner to set a new expiration time to extend the ownership of this contract

vote(bytes32,address).notice: Stores a vote from the message sender.  Each address can vote only once and only as long as the poll is not closed. Each address can also sell their voting rights for others, which allows the buyer to vote.

userdoc.notice: A poll is a contract that stores potential options to vote on, as well as which addresses have voted already. Addresses can vote on the poll until the poll owner closes the contract. Addresses can also put their votes for sale as long as they have not voted yet.
